detail_desc: Dungarees in soft cotton twill with press-studs at the front and frill-trimmed straps with concealed, adjustable fasteners.
Padded jacket with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Soft, non-wired, mesh triangle bra with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and no fasteners.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.

Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front, zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative detail on the chest, flap pocket on one sleeve, side pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.

Ankle-length skirt in a cotton and modal weave with a concealed zip in one side. High waist with covered elastication and a detachable belt with a covered buckle. Two slits at the front. Lined with a short skirt in woven fabric.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline and long puff sleeves. Unlined.

Oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. High collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.
Short-sleeved top in shimmering mesh. Unlined.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with reversible sequins on the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a lined tulle skirt.
Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Printed top with press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Metal earrings and studs in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 0.3 cm to 1.2 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Chiffon blouse with decorative flounces, a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in a soft cotton blend with a glittery text print. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and raglan sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back and gathered seams for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Metal hair grips decorated with glass rhinestones and plastic beads.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Long-sleeved top in patterned organic cotton jersey. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Body in crêpe jersey with a cut out V-neck opening front and back, a small stand-up collar and hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Press-studs at the crotch.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and detachable hood with striped cotton poplin lining. Drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Soft silicone smartphone case.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant decorated with glass rhinestones. Adjustable length.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in a soft, rib knit with a low neckline and button placket.

Dress in soft washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, flounced sleeves, a seam with elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Waist bag in sturdy imitation leather with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 12 cm. Width 17 cm.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a sequined mesh front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Scarf in woven fabric with a brushed finish and fringes on the short sides. Size 40x211 cm.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Narrow cut at the top with a narrow, smocked trim around the neckline, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and down one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Short, fitted skirt in crushed velvet with concealed elastication at the waist and a wrapover front.
Shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Two elasticated trims at the hem with an adjustable fastening.
V-neck top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a small stand-up collar.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms in fast-drying functional fabric with medium coverage at the back.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed boat neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist and a high slit at the front.
Fabric-covered Alice bands in various designs: one glittery, one with shimmering spots and one with a sewn-on bow.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Metal rings in various designs, one decorated with a stone-look plastic bead.
Bikini briefs in soft stretch fabric with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back. Seamless.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish, shawl collar and no buttons.
V-neck blouse in airy crêpe. Yoke with a double layer of fabric at the back, frills down the sleeves, buttons at the cuffs and slits in the sides.

Treggings in superstretch, flexible denim with darker sections on the front where protective pieces of fabric have been ripped off after washing. Elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, one with embroidery, and raw-edge hems.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently tailored jacket in a sturdy weave with narrow lapels, 3/4-length, gathered sleeves and no buttons. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
